description:
Gao and his friends try to come up with a strategy to defeat Sakate`s powerful Ambush technique. Zanya uncovers the truth about Sakate and his boss. Meanwhile, Sakate is back to his old tricks, playing mind games and trying to recruit Batzz.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Terrifying Ambush! Batzz`s Back Against the Wall!
恐怖の奇襲! バッツ絶体絶命!!
